entry.title: Incident with GitHub Actions
entry.content:
Jun 13, 13:52 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Jun 13, 12:13 UTC
Update - Actions Artifact Cache is experiencing degraded performance.

All other Github Actions services are operating normally. We're working to resolve the problem and we'll provide and update here soon.

Jun 13, 11:50 UTC
Update - GitHub Actions Cache is experiencing degraded performance.

We're working to resolve the problem and we'll provide and update here again soon

Jun 13, 11:28 UTC
Investigating - We are investigating reports of degraded performance for GitHub Actions.

entry.title: Insights charts maintenance
entry.content:
May 16, 21:00 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

May 12, 21:12 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

May 12, 21:11 UTC
Scheduled - GitHub is performing maintenance on the database backing repository and organization Insights charts - once the maintenance is completed, all charts will resume updating.

entry.title: Incident with GitHub Actions and Codespaces
entry.content:
Apr 14, 01:28 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Apr 13, 23:36 UTC
Update - Actions and Codespaces are operating normally except for incorrect billing reports. We have started a cleanup of incorrect billing information and expect that to be completed in a few hours.

Apr 13, 21:07 UTC
Update - We've applied a mitigation to unblock running Actions jobs and using Codespaces. We are currently working on addressing the inconsistencies in billing information.

Apr 13, 20:50 UTC
Update - We are investigating reports of users mistakenly seeing notifications that they've hit their billing limits for Actions and Codespaces.

Apr 13, 20:40 UTC
Update - Codespaces is experiencing degraded performance. We are still investigating and will provide an update when we have one.

Apr 13, 20:35 UTC
Investigating - We are investigating reports of degraded performance for GitHub Actions.

entry.title: Incident with GitHub Actions
entry.content:
Apr 12, 18:46 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Apr 12, 17:02 UTC
Update - GitHub Actions is experiencing capacity constraints with hosted macos-11 and macos-latest, leading to high wait times. Hosted Windows, hosted Linux, and self-hosted runners are not impacted.

Apr 12, 16:33 UTC
Investigating - We are investigating reports of degraded performance for GitHub Actions.

entry.title: Scheduled Maintenance for GitHub Actions
entry.content:
Apr 9, 01:00 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Apr 8, 23:01 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Apr 6, 16:37 UTC
Scheduled - Actions will be in a maintenance window from Friday, April 8th 23:00 to Saturday, April 9th 1:00 UTC as we migrate to a new database cluster. Starting jobs could be delayed during this timeframe. We will update our status with more details if there is notable impact. Our engineers will be working to minimize disruption as much as possible.

Update - Follow these steps to change creation region: https://docs.github.com/en/codespaces/customizing-your-codespace/setting-your-default-region-for-codespaces. Restarts cannot be changed to another region.

entry.title: Scheduled Maintenance for GitHub Actions
entry.content:
Mar 28, 15:03 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed. No jobs were delayed during maintenance today.

Mar 28, 12:01 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Mar 25, 15:31 UTC
Scheduled - Actions will be in a maintenance window on Monday, March 28th from 12:00 to 16:30 UTC as we apply mitigations to reduce mySQL1 load. Starting jobs could be delayed up to an hour during this timeframe. Our engineers will be working to minimize disruption as much as possible.
